thread.title: Accounting Today Names CPAmerica International Member Firm Managing Partners to 2015 MP Elite
thread.title_full: Accounting Today Names CPAmerica International Member Firm Managing Partners to 2015 MP Elite

author: Sarah Coulson
title: Accounting Today Names CPAmerica International Member Firm Managing Partners to 2015 MP Elite
text:
Accounting Today, the premier publication of the certified public accounting industry, has named two CPAmerica International member firm managing partners to the 2015 Managing Partner Elite list. Greg Burbach of Honkamp Krueger & Co., P.C., and Mike Gillis of DMJ & Co., PLLC, are two of eight managing partners across the country to receive this prestigious recognition from Accounting Today in the October 2015 issue. “I am truly humbled by this recognition by Accounting Today,” said Greg Burbach. “The success of this firm is a team effort by a trailblazing partner group and amazing staff who are here to contribute to the successes of our clients and communities. It’s been fun partnering with our clients to take the firm to a whole new level.”
“To be recognized by Accounting Today is truly an honor,” said Mike Gillis. “I’ve been so fortunate to be a part of DMJ for nearly three decades, and our ability to be successful as a firm is credited to our partners, our people, and our commitment to exceed expectations. More importantly, I’m so pleased that this shines the spotlight on our wonderful community and steadfast clients.”
Accounting Today’s Managing Partner Elite brings together a selection of the country’s best firm leaders, from firms of all sizes, to highlight the skills and strategies it takes to lead an organization to success in the 21st century.
For more information on Accounting Today’s MP Elite, click here to visit Accounting Today’s October digital issue .
About CPAmerica International:
CPAmerica International is an accounting association of independent CPA firms that provides practice management support, continuing education, marketing, online services and other programs for the improvement of its member firms. As a member of Crowe Horwath International, the association has more than 670 offices worldwide, and combined firm revenues of the alliance of more than $3 billion. Learn more about CPAmerica on the CPAmerica blog, LinkedIn and Twitter .
